author: Aevy TV
title: YouTube just hit $10.3 Billion in ad revenue—Here’s why you should care.

author: Aevy TV
description:
Learn to edit and create videos like AevyTV - https://class.aevytv.com/video_editing

India’s pollution crisis has reached a point where Delhi is recording AQI levels so high that weather apps show a skull emoji  and children growing up in the capital are predicted to lose 8–10 years of life. But what’s wild is that Beijing was once in the exact same position, even worse in 2013, and still managed to clean up its air in under a decade. This video breaks down why Delhi’s pollution is so catastrophic from its geographical bowl and winter inversion to vehicles, dust, construction, and crop burning  and then shows how Beijing executed one of the world’s most successful clean-air turnarounds. If Beijing could fix it with similar geography, tougher pollution, and the same excuses… why can’t we? Let’s understand the science, the politics, the money, and the accountability needed to actually save millions of Indian lives.

📌Follow us on Instagram here: https://www.instagram.com/aevytvdaily/
📌
title: How China Cleaned Its Air in 5 Years (And Why India Can’t)
